common/

ifsr_peak.pro


top ifsr_peak

IFSRED

result = ifsr_peak(cube, lamrange [, circ=byte] [, indrange=byte] [, quiet=byte] [, xranfit=dblarr(2)] [, yranfit=dblarr(2)])

Fit a 2D Gaussian to a data cube over a specified wavelength range using MPFIT2DPEAK. The data is first summed over that range.

Return value

Array of peak column and row and half-widths. First column and row are (1,1).

Parameters

cube in required type=structure

Contains data cube and associated information, in the form output by IFSF_READCUBE.

lamrange in required type=dblarr(2)

Lower and upper limits of wavelength regions to include in fit.

Keywords

circ in optional type=byte

Enforce fitting of a Gaussian symmetric in x and y.

indrange in optional type=byte

Give range for wavelength region to fit as indices rather than actual wavelengths. Indices are put in lamrange parameter.

quiet in optional type=byte

Suppress output of centroids and half-widths to terminal.

xranfit in optional type=dblarr(2)

Range for fitting centroid, in cube columns. Default is full range.

yranfit in optional type=dblarr(2)

Range for fitting centroid, in cube rows. Default is full range.

Author information
